application.algorithms.dae.DaeConfiguration module

class application.algorithms.dae.DaeConfiguration.DaeConfiguration(data_file: str = 'multi-dataset.csv', model_name: str = 'model.pkl', report_file: str = 'report.csv', seed: int = 42, latent_size: int = 32, epochs: int = 100, learning_rate: float = 0.005, noise_ratio: float = 0.1, split: float = 0.8, early_stopping_delta: float = 0.01, early_stopping_patience: int = 10)[source]

Bases: AlgorithmConfigurator

Configuration class for the DAE algorithm.

latent_size

The size of the latent space. Defaults to 32.

Type:

int

epochs

The number of epochs to train the autoencoder. Defaults to 100.

Type:

int

learning_rate

The learning rate for the optimizer. Defaults to 0.005.

Type:

float

noise_ratio

The ratio of noise to add to the input data. Defaults to 0.1.

Type:

float

split

The fraction of the dataset to be used for training. Defaults to 0.8.

Type:

float

early_stopping_delta

Minimum change to qualify as an improvement for early stopping. Defaults to 1e-2.

Type:

float

early_stopping_patience

Number of epochs with no improvement after which training will be stopped. Defaults to 10.

Type:

int

early_stopping_delta: float = 0.01
early_stopping_patience: int = 10
epochs: int = 100
latent_size: int = 32
learning_rate: float = 0.005
noise_ratio: float = 0.1
split: float = 0.8
